pullRequest.title: Updated README.md to match current design iteration of interface
pullRequest.bodyText:
The documentation for the dynamodb-enhanced module had fallen out of sync with the changes being made to the interface. This is to correct that and bring it up to date.
License




 I confirm that this pull request can be released under the Apache 2 license

commit.message: Updated README.md to match current design iteration of interface

nodes.bodyText: Not sure if you also want to update the name of the arg
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -134,7 +156,7 @@ key differences:
    an asynchronous DynamoDb client from the SDK as well):
    ```java
     AsyncMappedDatabase database = DynamoDbAsyncMappedDatabase.builder()
-                                                              .dynamoDbAsyncClient(dynamoDbAsyncClient)
+                                                              .dynamoDbClient(dynamoDbAsyncClient)

nodes.bodyText: Is there a create method on VersionedRecordExtension if it can be done no-args?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -184,18 +206,20 @@ that write will fail.
 To load the extension:
 ```java
 MappedDatabase database = 
-  MappedDatabase.builder()
-                .dynamoDbClient(dynbamoDbClient)
-                .extendWith(VersionedRecordExtension.builder().build())
-                .build();
